participant_abstract.sent: The three designers of the project presented their findings and ideas from the work they have done individually.
We discussed the functional requirements - including results from market research - to address what our customers want.
We discussed the internal design of the product - possibilities of smart chips and additional chips.
The project manager communicated additional project constraints and instructions.
The remote will be for TV only, excluding teletext, and should include the company logo.
We closed by discussing what buttons/functions would be included, the consumer base we are aiming for, and considerations regarding speech recognition.

participant_actions.sent: Continue work on the technical and functional design.

participant_decisions.sent: Design must include colour/slogan of company.
Simple but sleek and trendy design.
include a menu button for miscellaneous functions.
